text: Naive Bayes is a simple yet effective algorithm.
It is often used in text classification tasks.
Python is a popular programming language for data science.
Data preprocessing is an important step in machine learning pipelines.
Scikit-learn provides a wide range of machine learning algorithms
Deep learning models require a large amount of data for training.
Matplotlib and Seaborn are libraries used for data visualization
NLP stands for Natural Language Processing
Linear regression is a basic technique for regression analysis.
Decision trees are interpretable machine learning models.
Web scraping is used to extract data from websites.
Support Vector Machines (SVM) are effective for classification tasks.
K-means clustering is an unsupervised learning algorithm.
Neural networks are computational models inspired by the human brain.
Data analysis involves exploring and understanding datasets.
Random forests are an ensemble learning technique.
